name: Silver Knight (itch) (lajas)
description:
Teleport and fight monsters in as a knight in shining armor!

Rather than using the zip file, which is just the code for whoever's curious, here's a link! Silver Knight Game (ojocs.github.io)

This is a game I made back in my sophomore year at UT Austin, with 2 great partners. I did a lot of the programming, mainly for gameplay (characters).

Putting it here for portfolio reasons :p
